Find Homes. Manage Properties. Stay Connected. All-in-One. All-in-HausLink.

Built for both landlords and tenants, HausLink simplifies property management across the continent — from rental search to payment, communication, and maintenance.

🏠 I'm a Landlord 🏠 I'm a Tenant

The Renting Riddle, Solved.

Fragmented communication. Late payments. Endless maintenance issues. Renting property shouldn't be a logistical nightmare. We created HausLink to simplify every step of the rental experience—for both tenants and landlords.

See HausLink in Action

Experience both sides of our platform. Switch between landlord and tenant dashboards to see how we serve everyone in the rental ecosystem.
